title: Junior backend developer

title: Junior software developer
description:

Aside of the implicit knowledge, I gained significant experience in versioning (Git), issue tracking (Redmine, JIRA), and learned about Scrum.

Stack-wise, I mostly worked with Angular, and had some involvement with JSP, too.

title: Intern
place: HC Linear IT Development Ltd. | Pécs, Hungary
description:
A very short job period originally intended to be my obligatory internship fulfillment, required by my university.

My only duty was the testing of a billing machine used in public transport; and the creating of UI mockups for an upcoming project specification.

As my first job ever, it was a refreshing and exciting experience nonetheless.
